00026 // lbann_data_reader .hpp - Input data base class for training, testing

00029 #ifndef LBANN_DATA_READER_HPP
00030 #define LBANN_DATA_READER_HPP
00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_random.hpp"
00034 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_exception.hpp"
00035 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"

00038 #include <string>

00045 namespace lbann
00046 {
00047         class DataReader
00048         {
00049         public:
00050     DataReader(int batchSize, bool shuffle) :
00051       BatchSize(batchSize), CurrentPos(0), m_shuffle(shuffle),
00052       m_stride(batchSize), m_base_offset(0), m_model_offset(0), 
00053       m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size(false),
00054       m_last_mini_batch_threshold(0), m_last_mini_batch_size(batchSize), m_last_mini_batch_stride(0) 
00055     {}
00056     DataReader(int batchSize) :
00057       DataReader(batchSize, true) {}
00058     
00059     DataReader(const DataReader& source) :
00060       BatchSize(source.BatchSize), CurrentPos(source.CurrentPos), m_shuffle(source.m_shuffle),
00061       m_stride(source.m_stride), m_base_offset(source.m_base_offset), m_model_offset(source.m_model_offset),
00062       m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size(source.m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size),
00063       m_last_mini_batch_threshold(source.m_last_mini_batch_threshold), m_last_mini_batch_size(source.m_last_mini_batch_size), m_last_mini_batch_stride(source.m_last_mini_batch_stride),
00064       ShuffledIndices(source.ShuffledIndices), m_unused_indices(source.m_unused_indices)
00065     {}
00066 
00067     virtual ~DataReader() {}
00068 
00075     void setup(int base_offset, int stride, int model_offset = 0, lbann_comm *comm = NULL) {
00076       m_model_offset = model_offset;
00077       m_base_offset = base_offset;
00078       m_stride = stride;
00079 
00080       if(comm != NULL) {
00081         calculate_multi_model_data_distribution(comm);
00082         m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size = true;
00083       }
00084 
00085       CurrentPos = m_base_offset + m_model_offset;
00086       if (m_shuffle) {
00087         std::shuffle(ShuffledIndices.begin(), ShuffledIndices.end(),
00088                      get_generator());
00089       }
00090     }
00091 
00092     void setup() { DataReader::setup(0, BatchSize); }
00093 
00094                 virtual int fetch_data(Mat& X) { return 0; }
00095                 //      if (CurrentPos < (int)ShuffledIndices.size()) {
00096                 //              return true;
00097                 //      }
00098                 //      else {
00099                 //              return false;
00100                 //      }
00101                 // }
00102                 virtual int fetch_label(Mat& Y) { return 0; }
00103                 //      if (CurrentPos < (int)ShuffledIndices.size()) {
00104                 //              return true;
00105                 //      }
00106                 //      else {
00107                 //              return false;
00108                 //      }
00109                 // }
00115     virtual bool update() {
00116       if(m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size && CurrentPos+m_stride > m_last_mini_batch_threshold) {
00117         CurrentPos += m_last_mini_batch_stride;
00118       }else {
00119         CurrentPos += m_stride;
00120       }
00121       if (CurrentPos < (int)ShuffledIndices.size()) {
00122         return true;
00123       } else {
00124         if (m_shuffle) {
00125           std::shuffle(ShuffledIndices.begin(), ShuffledIndices.end(),
00126                        get_generator());
00127         }
00128         CurrentPos = m_base_offset + m_model_offset;
00129         return false;
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133                 virtual int getNumLabels() { return 0; }
00134     virtual int get_linearized_data_size() { return 0; }
00135     virtual int get_linearized_label_size() { return 0; }
00136 
00137     bool position_valid()   { return (CurrentPos < (int)ShuffledIndices.size()); }
00138     int getBatchSize()      { 
00139       if(m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size && CurrentPos >= m_last_mini_batch_threshold) {
00140         return m_last_mini_batch_size;
00141       }else {
00142         return BatchSize; 
00143       }
00144     }
00145                 int getPosition()       { return CurrentPos; }
00146     int get_next_position() { 
00147       if(m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size && CurrentPos+m_stride > m_last_mini_batch_threshold) {
00148         return CurrentPos + m_last_mini_batch_stride;
00149       }else {
00150         return CurrentPos + m_stride;
00151       }
00152     }
00153                 int* getIndices()       { return &ShuffledIndices[0]; }
00154                 int getNumData()        { return (int)ShuffledIndices.size(); }
00155                 int get_num_unused_data() { return (int)m_unused_indices.size(); }
00156                 int* get_unused_data()    { return &m_unused_indices[0]; }
00157 
00158     void select_subset_of_data(size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN) {
00159       size_t num_data_samples = getNumData();
00160       
00163       if (max_sample_count != 0) {
00164         max_sample_count = __MIN(max_sample_count, num_data_samples);
00165         if(!firstN) {
00166           std::shuffle(ShuffledIndices.begin(), ShuffledIndices.end(), get_generator());
00167         }
00168         m_unused_indices=std::vector<int>(ShuffledIndices.begin() + max_sample_count, ShuffledIndices.end());
00169         ShuffledIndices.resize(max_sample_count);
00170 
00171         if(!firstN) {
00172           std::sort(ShuffledIndices.begin(), ShuffledIndices.end());
00173           std::sort(m_unused_indices.begin(), m_unused_indices.end());
00174         }
00175 
00176         // std::cout << "shuffled indices ";
00177         // for (auto i = ShuffledIndices.begin(); i != ShuffledIndices.end(); ++i)
00178         //   std::cout << *i << ' ';
00179         // std::cout << std::endl;
00180 
00181         // std::cout << "unused indices ";
00182         // for (auto i = m_unused_indices.begin(); i != m_unused_indices.end(); ++i)
00183         //   std::cout << *i << ' ';
00184         // std::cout << std::endl;
00185       }
00186     }
00187 
00188     bool swap_used_and_unused_index_sets() {
00189       std::vector<int> tmp_indices = ShuffledIndices;
00190       ShuffledIndices = m_unused_indices;
00191       m_unused_indices = tmp_indices;
00192       return true;
00193     }
00194 
00195     DataReader& operator=(const DataReader& source) {
00196       this->BatchSize = source.BatchSize;
00197       this->CurrentPos = source.CurrentPos;
00198       this->m_shuffle = source.m_shuffle;
00199       this->m_stride = source.m_stride;
00200       this->m_base_offset = source.m_base_offset;
00201       this->m_model_offset = source.m_model_offset;
00202       this->m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size = source.m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size;
00203       this->m_last_mini_batch_threshold = source.m_last_mini_batch_threshold;
00204       this->m_last_mini_batch_size = source.m_last_mini_batch_size;
00205       this->m_last_mini_batch_stride = source.m_last_mini_batch_stride;
00206 
00207       // Vectors implement a deep copy
00208       this->ShuffledIndices = source.ShuffledIndices;
00209       this->m_unused_indices = source.m_unused_indices;
00210       return *this;
00211     }
00212 
00213     size_t trim_data_set(double use_percentage, bool firstN=false) {
00214       size_t max_sample_count = rint(getNumData()*use_percentage);
00215       
00216       if(max_sample_count > getNumData() || ((long) max_sample_count) < 0) {
00217         throw lbann_exception("data reader trim error: invalid number of samples selected");
00218       }
00219       select_subset_of_data(max_sample_count, firstN);
00220 
00221       return getNumData();
00222     }
00223 
00224     void calculate_multi_model_data_distribution(lbann_comm *comm) {
00225       int max_mini_batch_size = BatchSize;
00226       int num_parallel_readers_per_model = (m_stride / comm->get_num_models()) / max_mini_batch_size;
00227 
00228       int num_whole_mini_batches = rint(getNumData() / m_stride);
00229       int partial_mini_batch_size = (getNumData() - (num_whole_mini_batches*m_stride))/(comm->get_num_models() * num_parallel_readers_per_model);
00230       int world_master_remainder_data = 0;
00231 
00232       int world_master_remainder_adjustment = getNumData() 
00233         - (num_whole_mini_batches * m_stride) 
00234         - (partial_mini_batch_size * comm->get_num_models() * num_parallel_readers_per_model);
00235       if(comm->am_world_master()) {
00236         world_master_remainder_data = world_master_remainder_adjustment;
00237         world_master_remainder_adjustment = 0;
00238       }
00239       partial_mini_batch_size += world_master_remainder_data;
00240 
00241       m_last_mini_batch_threshold = m_stride * num_whole_mini_batches;
00242       m_last_mini_batch_size = partial_mini_batch_size;
00243 
00246       int num_readers_at_full_stride = (comm->get_num_models() - comm->get_model_rank()) * num_parallel_readers_per_model;
00248       int num_readers_at_last_stride = comm->get_model_rank() * num_parallel_readers_per_model;
00249       if(comm->get_rank_in_model() < num_parallel_readers_per_model) { 
00250         num_readers_at_full_stride -= comm->get_rank_in_model();
00251         num_readers_at_last_stride += comm->get_rank_in_model();
00252       }
00255       m_last_mini_batch_stride = max_mini_batch_size * num_readers_at_full_stride
00256         + (partial_mini_batch_size * (num_readers_at_last_stride)) + world_master_remainder_adjustment;
00257 
00258       //      cout << "[" << comm->get_rank_in_world() << "] " << comm->get_model_rank() << " model rank, num_whole_mini_batches=" << num_whole_mini_batches << " partial_mini_batch_size=" << partial_mini_batch_size << " world_master_remainder_data=" << world_master_remainder_data << " threshold " << m_last_mini_batch_threshold << " with a last stride of " << m_last_mini_batch_stride << " and stride of " << m_stride << " and there are " << num_parallel_readers_per_model << " parallel readers per model " <<endl;
00259 
00260       return;
00261     }
00262 
00263   protected:
00264     int                                                 BatchSize;
00265     int                                                 CurrentPos;
00266     int             m_shuffle;
00267     int             m_stride;       
00268     int             m_base_offset;  
00269 
00270     int             m_model_offset;  
00271 
00272 
00273     bool            m_use_alt_last_mini_batch_size;
00274     int             m_last_mini_batch_threshold;
00275     int             m_last_mini_batch_size;
00276     int             m_last_mini_batch_stride;
00277 
00278     std::vector<int>                    ShuffledIndices;
00279     std::vector<int>                    m_unused_indices; 
00280         };
